intro: JUMP INTO THE BEAST, SWITCH BETWEEN YOUR POWERFUL MECHA AND AGILE PET, AND DOMINATE THE BATTLEFIELD IN THIS FAST-PACED HERO SHOOTER !
description:
Discover the new hit game from the developers of FRAG Pro Shooter!

BEAST is a high-energy Hero Shooter delivering quick, action-packed battles. Switch seamlessly between your powerful MECHA and agile PET as you explore an epic story mode or dive into intense multiplayer matches. Choose from a wide variety of heroes and engage in explosive, strategic combat – perfect for players seeking a fast, accessible, and thrilling challenge!

- Uncover the heroes' stories in an all-new story mode. Embark on thrilling missions, explore stunning planets, meet unforgettable characters, and immerse yourself in a captivating narrative that brings the world of BEAST to life!

- Engage in a thrilling 3v3 multiplayer hero shooter where each match delivers quick and intense action with powerful Mechas! Choose your favorite character and dive into quick, action-packed games that offer easy, pick-up-and-play fun. BEAST offers a light-hearted, laid-back experience open to anyone, boasting quick matches full of excitement!

- Experience a dynamic dual gameplay system. Switch seamlessly between your powerful MECHA for brute strength and your agile PET for nimble tactics, each offering unique skills that bring versatility and depth to every match! Seamless transitions and sharp strategy will turn the tide in your favor!

- Choose from a roster of unique heroes, each with their own special abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer heavy firepower, quick strikes, or strategic defense, there’s a hero that fits your gameplay and adds a new dimension to every battle!

- Skill matters most, not your wallet! With no microtransactions, BEAST guarantees a fair and balanced playing field for your progression where your abilities and achievements drive your success. It’s all about your skills, strategy, and teamwork!
